offlinemot.objects_classes.TrafficObj.update

TrafficObj.update()[source]

Test the object if still need to be tracked, or it is lost so if it needs to be deleted

Returns

a tuple of two boolean varaible, the first to test if the object are lost and the second to test if it was real object or noise.

Return type

tuple
